entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When MVC uses parameters to get submitted data, Request.Body cannot get the data. #40421
  • Extra double quote in classname in <div> tag is not an error and page looks OK but <a asp-page="/Page"> does not work #40418
    Backlog
  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.Build.Framework, Version=15.1.0.0 #40417
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.StaticWebAssets.targets(442,5): error : Two assets found targeting the same path with incompatible asset kinds #40416
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #40415
  • Reconnect modal displays immediately in Firefox upon navigation #40414
  • SignalR negotiation sometimes fails on the first attempt #40413
  • Consider JsonValidationMetadataProviders affect only API Controllers #40408
  • [Discussion] Blazor components are type activated by default #40405
    Discussions

Closed

  • Quarantine StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #39477
    Test failures
  • Quarantine StopProcessingNextRequestSendsGracefulGOAWAYThenFinalGOAWAYWhenAllStreamsComplete #39492
    Test failures
  • Quarantine AcceptNewStreamsDuringClosingConnection #39479
    Test failures
  • Quarantine GOAWAY_Received_SetsConnectionStateToClosingAndWaitForAllStreamsToComplete #39520
    Test failures
  • Possible incorrect sorting in KnownHeaders.cs #40062
  • .NET 6 & VS2022 minimal API templates #38513
    Discussions
  • Blazor, InputText does not support changing the EditContext dynamically, when adding forms dynamically #40388
  • UseCorrectCatchAllBehavior breaks optional parameter behavior #40389
  • Add overload to modify StaticFileOptions for UseBlazorFrameworkFiles #40390
  • Indentation in new Web API project #40401
  • [Blazor] Razor components give build errors if project includes any reference with "System" as the final part of its namespace #40391
  • Custom icon is not getting set in visual studio 2019 #40289
  • Static Assets -- what's happening? #40369

PullRequests

Created

  • !nits! Cleanup three projects #40422
  • Fix DelegationRule to work after receiver restarts #40420
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix incorrect h2 header decoding. #40412
    area-runtime
  • Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40411
    area-infrastructure
  • Speed up contended HTTP/2 frame writing (500% gRPC h2 70x1 improvement) #40407
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Cleanup ActivatorUtilities #40409
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Added reference to the Deveel's MongoDB #40323
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Unquarantine fixed tests #40419
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Clarify sort order for known headers #40410
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Enable CA1810 as a warning #40384
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • [Do not merge] Test IIS locally on CI #40381
    area-runtime
  • Add missing `BeforeTargets` for IIS local testing #40379
    area-runtime
  • Mark -internal blobs as nonshipping #40380
    area-infrastructure
  • [WIP] Update installer/tests for ARM64 #39523
    area-runtime
  • Use libnethost to find hostfxr #39810
    area-runtime
  • Error when Hubs are registered as Singletons #40396
    area-signalr
  • feat (Minimal) : Add `EmptyResult` #40171
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • return value for single HttpContext parameter #40235
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Removed duplicated and nested dispatcher invoking. #40366
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Clean up indentation #40400
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Fix ResourceManagerStringLocalizerFactory caching #33129
    area-mvc
  • Remove SocketException usage #38094
    area-runtime
